name: Shangri-La
description:
For Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019

Highly dangerous, agile, and able to shoot her own parts out of her and regenerate, Adeline has escaped the confines of her creators and has gone rouge in the Shangri-La city, taking other things DNA and using it to her advantage. Help her escape and become more powerful.

Uses the DNA Chaos theme!

CONTROLS

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Left Click to Melee

Right click to Shoot

FEATURES

- Precise Platforming

- Melee and Shooter Elements

- Dangerous Enemy Types

- A Futuristic World

JAM ACHIEVEMENTS

Tango - Your team size is 2.

CREDITS

Programming by Cloud Catcher

Art by Smokeyocity

Song by Nameless Warning
